debug.description: Outlines the grid system so you can visualize the layout.

fill.description: Sets whether the Box should fill up all available space.

flex.description: Controls the CSS flex property. Options "grow" "shrink" "basis".

shift_down.description: Shifts the box to the bottom of the parent Bounds.

shift_left.description: Shifts the box to the left of the parent Bounds.

shift_right.description: Shifts the box to the right of the parent Bounds.

shift_up.description: Shifts the box to the top of the parent Bounds.
